title: Single storied House for sale @ Battaramulla
details:
Single storied House for sale @ Battaramulla

Land & Floor Area -
13 perches, (1200 sq,ft)

3 Beds with 2 Baths (Master Attached)
1 Geezer hot / Fully tiled
Living / Dining with TV area
Back yard large eye catching Garden
Pipe born water with over head water tank
Bricked Walls / Timber Ceiling / Celling fans
Having 2 entrances to the land
Car porch plus parking space for another 5 or 6 vehicles
Surrounded by well built walla with 2 steel gate

24.5 million , 245 Laks (Negotiable)
